overview: Using their good looks and charm to gain entry into million dollar homes, Mandy and Sandy are ready to risk it all. The two bumbling burglars are preparing for their biggest score of all and while prepping, the two share stories of past heists. And the one common theme? Lots of HOT sex! Watch as these two sexy thieves give as much as they take!
tagline: Better keep an eye on your drawers!
title: The Panty Thieves
